page.title: 20Ropley Domesday Compilers
page.content: The study of the area for this Domesday project was carried out mainly by the 3rd and 4th year children of Ropley School with the help of parents and residents.Only a small number of the children actually live within the D-block as a large part of the village of Ropley lies outside the study area.When we started the study we found that many of us did not know our block very well and we discovered a great deal about the area from our Domesday study.We started by studying different scale maps of the area and maps of different dates to see what things had changed.We went out all over the area - by car for general surveys and on foot for more detailed information.We talked to old residents of the area and to people who were newcomers.We ran out of time at the end and it was a rush to finish
